trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event occurs after a row is painted on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>esemény következik be, miután egy sor kerül meghívásra a egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>vezérlő.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> allows you to manually adjust the appearance of the row after the cells in the row are painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>Miután a sorban szereplő cellák egyikére festi manuálisan úgy, hogy a sor megjelenésének teszi lehetővé.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you want to customize the row.
trans-unit.target: Ez akkor hasznos, ha szeretné testre szabni a sort.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that owns the row that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> birtokló a sor kerül meghívásra alatt.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> használt festeni a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> azt a területet, amely jelöli az <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kell festeni igénylő.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza a határai a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> van folyamatban meghívásra.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A cella, kerül meghívásra alatt sor indexe.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Tagértékeinek <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> érték, amely megadja a sor állapotát.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the row.
trans-unit.target: Olyan hibaüzenetet, amely kapcsolódik a sort.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the row.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> , hogy a sor formázás és stílus információkat tartalmaz.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the first row currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>az jelzi, hogy az aktuális sor jelenleg jelenik meg az első sor a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the current row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>az jelzi, hogy az aktuális sor utolsó sorában az <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> , amely rendelkezik a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>tulajdonsága <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: -or- graphics is .
trans-unit.target: -or- graphics is .

trans-unit.source: -or- inheritedRowStyle is .
trans-unit.target: -or- inheritedRowStyle is .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a terület a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> , amely újrarajzolását lennie kell.

trans-unit.source: The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A ClipBounds tulajdonság jelöli a terület a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, kell lennie újrarajzolását.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Például, ha a felhasználó hozzá van rendelve a teljes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>egy másik ablakban, majd felfedezi, majd ClipBounds jelenti. a teljes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felhasználó a kisméretű a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, majd felfedezi, majd ClipBounds jelenti. a kis területet, amely vonatkozik.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> azt a területet, amely jelöli az <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> , amely újrarajzolását lennie kell.

trans-unit.source: Draws the focus rectangle around the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Megrajzolja a fókuszt a megadott határoknak körül.

trans-unit.source: Use the DrawFocus method when you draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and its cells' contents yourself.
trans-unit.target: A DrawFocus módszert használja, ha rajzolt a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>és a cella tartalmát, saját magának.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the focus area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a fókusz területen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the color of the focus rectangle; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>használatához a <> </> *> tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> tulajdonság meghatározásához; a Fókusznégyszög színe <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> használata a <> </> *> tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális hibaüzenetet jelölő karakterlánccá <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the ErrorText property is the same as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: A ErrorText tulajdonság értéke ugyanaz, mint az aktuális sor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális hibaüzenetet jelölő karakterlánccá <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> festeni a jelenleg használt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods that are useful for custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>osztály biztosít tulajdonságai és metódusai, amelyek hasznosak a egyéni rajz.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> festeni a jelenleg használt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style applied to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális alkalmazott cellastílus <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The InheritedRowStyle property contains the same values as the current row's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A InheritedRowStyle tulajdonsága tartalmazza az aktuális sor értékeitől <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Directly accessing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> can affect performance.
trans-unit.target: Közvetlen hozzáférés a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>befolyásolhatja a teljesítményt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>

trans-unit.source: Use InheritedRowStyle in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint> event to avoid unsharing the row and maintain optimal performance.
trans-unit.target: A InheritedRowStyle használja a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>esemény elkerülése érdekében a sor védtünk és optimális teljesítményének megőrzése.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowPostPaint>

trans-unit.source: The InheritedRowStyle property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: A InheritedRowStyle tulajdonság csak olvasható.

trans-unit.source: Although you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> retrieved through the InheritedRowStyle property, the new settings will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Bár tulajdonságai között állíthatja be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>beolvassa a InheritedRowStyle tulajdonságon keresztül, az új beállítások nem lesz hatása.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style applied to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az aktuális alkalmazott cellastílus <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy-e az első sor jelenik meg az aktuális sor lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the row being painted is currently the first row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a sort éppen festeni jelenleg az első sor jelenik meg a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current row is the last visible row displayed in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy-e az utolsó látható sor jelenik meg az aktuális sor lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current row is the last row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that has the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*> property set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az aktuális sor utolsó sorában az <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> , amely rendelkezik a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>tulajdonsága <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified cell parts for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: A megadott cella kijelzők található a megadott határoknak területre festi-e ki.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a terület a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kell festeni.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Tagértékeinek <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> értékek megadása festeni a kijelzőket.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell backgrounds for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: A cella hátterek található a megadott határoknak területre festi-e ki.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a terület a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kell festeni.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>a megadott határoknak hátterének színét az festeni a a <> </> *> tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> festeni a megadott határoknak hátterének színét az kíván a <> </> *> tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell contents for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: A cella tartalmát a megadott határoknak a területre festi-e ki.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely megadja, hogy a terület a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kell festeni.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the entire row header of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A jelenlegi teljes sorfejlécében festi <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the color of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor*> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to paint the row header with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor*> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>a színének sorazonosítóra festeni a <> </> *> tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> számára a sorazonosítóra festeni a <> </> *>, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> tulajdonság.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the row header of the current row.
trans-unit.target: A megadott részeit az aktuális sor sorfejlécében festi-e ki.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Tagértékeinek <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> értékek megadása festeni a kijelzőket.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than zero or greater than the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control minus one.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>kisebb nullánál vagy nagyobb, mint a sorok száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> vezérlő eggyel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs.RowIndex*>

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális határán beolvasása <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width of the RowBounds property is the same as the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: A RowBounds tulajdonság szélességének megegyezik a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> szélessége

trans-unit.source: To get the width of the columns in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Az oszlopok szélességét lekérni a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, használja a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.GetColumnsWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> , amely jelzi, hogy az aktuális határain <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális index <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The row index can be used to access the current row within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A sorindex használható az aktuális sor egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCollection> eléréséhez

trans-unit.source: The index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális index <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az aktuális állapotának <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to determine whether the row is frozen, read-only, or selected, among other states.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság segítségével határozza meg, hogy a sor zárolva van, csak olvasható, vagy a kijelölt, más államok között.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: Tagértékeinek <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> érték, amely megadja a sor állapotát.
